sentences: They clawed their way to the top of the mountain .
He downed three martinis before dinner .
The mother drinks in every word of her son on the stage .
They hunted the unwanted immigrants out of the neighborhood .
She had to juggle her job and her children .
The news were leaked to the paper .
He locked his hands around her neck .
The hiker negociated the high mountain pass .
The guy hanging around the school is pushing drugs .
The tornado ripped along the coast .
The huge waves swallowed the small boat and it sank shortly thereafter .
Every summer , we visited our relatives in the country for a month .
